pr_title: MULE-18794: Cannot access application resources from KeyResolver for Configurations Part 2

timeline.bodyText: I would set the type resolver for a specific operation you want to modify, or create a new one.
timeline.author: ndinu

replies.author: SebaElizalde

timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: I don't feel that this test belongs in this class.
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: If you are going to assert that the operation metadata key resolution and source metadata key resolution are using the correct class loader, I would make them use two different resolvers, and use the addClassLoader method with different values.
timeline.author: ndinu

replies.bodyText: They both end up calling the same method, so I don't feel like there is a need to distinguish between sources and operations by making 2 separate tests.
replies.author: SebaElizalde

replies.bodyText: I think that calling the same method is an implementation detail, we should cover both cases.
replies.author: ndinu
